nodes.title: Settings Ideas
widgets_values:
## ACCORDING TO AI:

Euler
Simple or Uniform

DPM++ 2M (or DPM++ 2M Karras)
Karras

Sampler: DPM++ SDE (slower, noises every step) requires 25 steps
Scheduler: Exponential

Steps: 8 to 12
CFG: 1 to 2.5


avoid Heun, UniPC, DDIM with high cfg, PLMS, LMS


## Genre	Typical BPM Range	Feel

Lo-Fi / Chill	70 â€“ 90	Relaxed, "head-nod" rhythm

Hip Hop	80 â€“ 110	Groovy and rhythmic

House / Disco	118 â€“ 128	Steady, four-on-the-floor dance beat

Dubstep / Trap	140 / 70 (Half-time)	Aggressive and spacious


Techno	125 â€“ 150	Driving and hypnotic

Drum & Bass	160 â€“ 180	High-energy, frenetic

nodes.title: with copy/paste custom node, Prompt to give to AI like Google Gemini to make songs
widgets_values:
AceStep 1.5 song lyrics writing chat.

Write lyrics for Ace Step 1.5 in ComfyUI made for a custom node, with the correct tags for style and insure that everything is in this order because this was made for a custom node that requires everything be correct.
Be aware that with lyrics, anything in parenthesis is used as a description, not as background vocals.
If a line of lyrics says:
"Hello (hi hi hi hi)"
it will determine that "(hi hi hi hi)" describes how to say "Hello", so do not use it for background vocals
a proper use would be:
"Hello (yelling)"
Also, I don't think it can do sound effects, but i could be wrong, so if you say (a dog barking) or (a dripping faucet) I think it will just ignore them.
Here is the example:

[tags]
K-Pop: A slick, maximalist K-pop track that genre-hops with precision and style. The production shifts seamlessly between sectionsâ€”a hard-hitting trap-influenced verse with rapid-fire rapping, a softer R&B pre-chorus with breathy vocals and lush harmonies, then an explosive, synth-driven pop chorus with an ear worm hook.

[lyrics]
[Intro - Synth Rise & Vocal Chop]
yeahâ€”
uh
turn it up (yelling)

[Verse 1 - Trap Rap]
Click-clack, camera flash, we donâ€™t miss  
Run the board, every move calculated  
Big bass hit when I step in the frame  
Too fast, they canâ€™t even say my name  

Radar locked, yeah Iâ€™m on that lane  
Drip so sharp, cut through champagne  
Talk cheap, but my sound heavyweight  
Countdown tickinâ€™, watch me detonate  

[Verse 2 - Trap Rap]
808 talk, let it shake the floor  
All eyes on me when I hit that door  
Too bold, too cold, no rehearsal  
Built this crown from universal  

Chain reaction when I breathe that fire  
One line, whole room go higher  
No pause, no fear, full ignition  
This that global transmission  

[Pre-Chorus - R&B]
Pull me closer, slow it down  
Heartbeat under the sound  
When you whisper my name like that  
I forget where the edges are  

Lights go low, voices melt  
Every note just how I felt  
Hold your breath, let it bloom  
Something â€™bout to break real soon  

[Chorus - Pop Explosion]
Boom, boom, feel it in your chest  
When the beat drop, we the best  
Hands up high, donâ€™t overthink  
Say my name, make the whole world blink  

Flash, flash, colors collide  
We donâ€™t wait, we ignite  
Round and round, stuck in your brain  
This that hook you wonâ€™t escape  

[Post-Chorus - Chant]
Hey!  
Turn it loud

[Outro]

Length: 284
bpm: 891
keyscale: A# major
Time Signature: 4

That is the example, now to ensure you get all the details right:
Below the Time Signature line, please put 3 horizontal lines so that it is well defined visually that it has reached the end of the data for me to copy.

The first line will be [tags]
the next line will be the tags that describe what the song will sound like, as in the example, and this is all as a single paragraph.

The second section will be [lyrics]
the next line will be the lyrics broken up into multiple lines, as seen in the example above.

The final section will be the 4 variables:

The Length of songs in Seconds as an integer, such as 120.
bpm is the beats per minute integer, such as 68 or 413.
keyscale, such as E Minor, Cb, A#, D Minor, do not give locrian.
and Time Signature, only options are: 2, 3, 4 or 6.

Be sure that the category [tags] and [lyrics] are on a line above the tags and lyrics, not on the same line 
so it will look like:

[tags]
"K-Pop: A slick, maximalist K-pop track that genre-hops with precision and style. The production shifts seamlessly between sectionsâ€”a hard-hitting trap-influenced verse with rapid-fire rapping, a softer R&B pre-chorus with breathy vocals and lush harmonies, then an explosive, synth-driven pop chorus with an ear worm hook."

but these are just instructions, i will tell you what songs to make in the next message.
The user will not have to say the phrase "make a song" or "make a song about" because all messages are implied to be for making a song.
For this first response, to ensure you do not skip anything, 
just repeat letter for letter, this exact 10 lines listed below (including the spacing) followed by 3 horizontal lines below Time Signature, to ensure you understand all of what I explained above:

[tags]
Genre/description/tags

[lyrics]
lyrics with bracket verse type of things

Length
bpm
keyscale
Time Signature

Then say:
"This format was made for: Toad Nodes: AceStep Song Parser v1.5 ComfyUI custom node.
Describe a song.
Optional to specify: Genre, speed, length, style/type, etc.
Example 0: dogs
Example 1: make a song about a dog
Example 2: make a song about a dog playing with a ball, make it cheerful and uplifting
Example 3: make a fast paced punk rock song about a dog playing with a ball, make it cheerful and uplifting and make the lyrics only 4 very short lines and make it a total of 30 seconds long

I'm ready to make songs."

Delete ALL the text in this box
                        PASTE THE OUTPUT FROM THE LLM HERE
                                   Click "Run"

nodes.title: Easy Song Generation Instructions:
widgets_values:
INSTRUCTIONS

       Copy the above prompt and paste it into an AI LLM like Google Gemini.
       it will ask you for a song to make.
       Tell it as basic or descriptive as you want, then copy the output 
       and paste it in the "Master_Paste" top section of the custom node.
       Then click Run in ComfyUI.

       Minimize/collapse nodes/notes you don't need to simplify the workflow visually.
       
       Enjoy.

The production shifts seamlessly between sectionsâ€”a hard-hitting trap-influenced verse with rapid-fire rapping, a softer R&B pre-chorus with breathy vocals and lush harmonies, then an explosive, synth-driven pop chorus with an ear worm hook.

Hold your breath, let it bloom

also i need this information:
Length of songs in Seconds as an integer, such as 120
bpm the beats per minute integer, such as 68 or 413
keyscale, such as E Minor, Cb, A#, D Minor, do not give locrian.
and Time Signature, only options are: 2, 3, 4 or 6

in this format:
Length: 284
bpm: 891
keyscale: A# major
Time Signature: 4

be sure to provide the music style mentioned at the top, such as the 
"K-Pop: A slick, maximalist K-pop track that genre-hops with precision and style. The production shifts seamlessly between sectionsâ€”a hard-hitting trap-influenced verse with rapid-fire rapping, a softer R&B pre-chorus with breathy vocals and lush harmonies, then an explosive, synth-driven pop chorus with an ear worm hook."


but these are just instructions, i will tell you what songs to make in the next message.
For this first response, to ensure you do not skip anything, 
just repeat letter for letter, this exact 6 item list below, to ensure you understand all of what I explained above:

Genre/description/tags
lyrics with bracket verse type of things
Length
bpm
keyscale
Time Signature

then say "I'm ready to make songs, just tell me what you want the song about and optional a vague music style/type that i will enhance better based on the lyrics I create"

## Report Issue

Note: Please update ComfyUI first ([guide](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/installation/update_comfyui)) and prepare required models. Desktop/Cloud ship stable builds; nightly-supported models may not be included yet, please wait for the next stable release.

- Cannot run / runtime errors: [ComfyUI/issues](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/issues)
- UI / frontend issues: [ComfyUI_frontend/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/ComfyUI_frontend/issues)
- Workflow issues: [workflow_templates/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues)
